name: @gjsify/docs
description: Monorepo to generate Typescript types and documentations for GJS and node-gtk

scripts.start:gjs: yarn run build:gjs && yarn run serve:gjs
scripts.start:node-gtk: yarn run build:node-gtk && yarn run serve:node-gtk
scripts.start:try:gjs: yarn run build:try:gjs && yarn run serve:try:gjs
scripts.start:gjs:local: yarn run build:gjs:local && yarn run serve:gjs
scripts.start:node-gtk:local: yarn run build:node-gtk:local && yarn run serve:node-gtk
scripts.start:try:gjs:local: yarn run build:try:gjs:local && yarn run serve:try:gjs
scripts.update:submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.build:types:node-gtk: yarn run clear:types:node-gtk && NODE_OPTIONS="" ts-for-gir generate '*' -e node --useNamespace --moduleType commonjs --ignoreConflicts
scripts.build:types:try:node-gtk: NODE_OPTIONS="" ts-for-gir generate GLib-2.0 GObject-2.0 -e node --useNamespace --moduleType commonjs --ignoreConflicts
scripts.build:types:gjs: yarn run clear:types:gjs && NODE_OPTIONS="" ts-for-gir generate '*' -e gjs --useNamespace --moduleType esm --ignoreConflicts
scripts.build:types:try:gjs: NODE_OPTIONS="" ts-for-gir generate GLib-2.0 GObject-2.0 -e gjs --useNamespace --moduleType esm --ignoreConflicts
scripts.build:types: yarn run build:types:gjs && yarn run build:types:node-gtk
scripts.build:docs:node-gtk: yarn run clear:docs:node-gtk && yarn workspace @gjsify/typedoc-build-docs run build:node-gtk
scripts.build:docs:try:node-gtk: yarn run clear:docs:try:node-gtk && yarn workspace @gjsify/typedoc-build-docs run build:try:node-gtk
scripts.build:docs:node-gtk:local: yarn run clear:docs:node-gtk && yarn workspace @gjsify/typedoc-build-docs run build:node-gtk:local
scripts.build:docs:try:node-gtk:local: yarn run clear:docs:try:node-gtk && yarn workspace @gjsify/typedoc-build-docs run build:try:node-gtk:local
scripts.build:docs:gjs: yarn run clear:docs:gjs && yarn workspace @gjsify/typedoc-build-docs run build:gjs
scripts.build:docs:try:gjs: yarn run clear:docs:try:gjs && yarn workspace @gjsify/typedoc-build-docs run build:try:gjs
scripts.build:docs:gjs:local: yarn run clear:docs:gjs && yarn workspace @gjsify/typedoc-build-docs run build:gjs:local
scripts.build:docs:try:gjs:local: yarn run clear:docs:try:gjs && yarn workspace @gjsify/typedoc-build-docs run build:try:gjs:local
scripts.build:docs: yarn run build:docs:gjs && yarn run build:docs:node-gtk
scripts.build:docs:local: yarn run build:docs:gjs:local && yarn run build:docs:node-gtk:local
scripts.build:node-gtk: yarn run build:types:node-gtk && yarn run build:docs:node-gtk
scripts.build:try:node-gtk: yarn run build:types:try:node-gtk && yarn run build:docs:try:node-gtk
scripts.build:try:node-gtk:local: yarn run build:types:try:node-gtk && yarn run build:docs:try:node-gtk:local
scripts.build:gjs: yarn run build:types:gjs && yarn run build:docs:gjs
scripts.build:try:gjs: yarn run build:types:try:gjs && yarn run build:docs:try:gjs
scripts.build:gjs:local: yarn run build:types:gjs && yarn run build:docs:gjs:local
scripts.build:try:gjs:local: yarn run build:types:try:gjs && yarn run build:docs:try:gjs:local
scripts.build:packages:ts-for-gir: cd vendor/ts-for-gjs && NODE_OPTIONS="" npm install && NODE_OPTIONS="" npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="" npm link
scripts.watch:packages:ts-for-gir: cd vendor/ts-for-gjs && NODE_OPTIONS="" npm install && NODE_OPTIONS="" npm run watch && NODE_OPTIONS="" npm link
scripts.validate: yarn run validate:gjs && yarn run validate:node-gtk

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
